texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The TfL lane rental scheme (TLRS) applies to the most traffic-sensitive locations and times of day across 56% of the Transport for London Road Network (TLRN). The scheme encourages behaviour change and reduces highway occupation by applying a daily charge."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Reference documents"}
These documents provide details on the scheme as well as the applicable locations:

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Lane rental scheme order","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/the-street-works-charges-for-occupation-of-the-highway-transport-for-london-order-2012.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 0KB","image":{}},{"title":"Lane rental scheme document","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-lane-rental-scheme-document-tlrs.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 243KB","image":{}},{"title":"Schedule of lane rental locations (Word format)","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-lane-rental-scheme-schedule-of-locations-01042018..doc","icon":"download","size":".DOC 1.07MB","image":{}},{"title":"Schedule of lane rental locations (PDF format)","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-lane-rental-scheme-schedule-of-locations-01042018..pdf","icon":"download","size":".PDF 840KB","image":{}},{"title":"GIS files in ESRI format","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tlrs-lane-rental-01042018-esri.zip","icon":"download","size":"ZIP 416KB","image":{}},{"title":"GIS files in TAB format","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tlrs-lane-rental-01042018-mapinfo.zip","icon":"download","size":"ZIP 262KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

The two ZIP downloads above contain GIS files in TAB and ESRI format. The files can be used to upload the spatial representation of lane rental locations into most mapping systems. Please note that these files should only be downloaded via desktop computers.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Lane rental borough maps"}
We've produced maps and GIS layers for lane rental locations across London:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"http://planning.data.tfl.gov.uk/\"\u003eDownload borough maps\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Supplementary guidance"}
The purpose of the supplementary guidance document below is to provide clarity on certain areas and questions relating to the TLRS that have arisen since the scheme went live in June 2012.
If you want to apply for a reduction or waiver in relation to this document, please complete the Apply to waive/reduce/exempt charges form below and return it to lanerentalqueries@tfl.gov.uk .

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Supplementary guidance","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tlrs-supplementary-guidance....pdf","icon":"download","size":"...PDF 469KB","image":{}},{"title":"Apply to waive/reduce/exempt charges","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/application-to-waive-reduce-or-exempt-charges...doc","icon":"download","size":"..DOC 64KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Monitoring reports"}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Lane Rental Governance Committee (LRGC)"}

A Lane Rental Governance Committee (LRGC) has been established to manage surplus income generated from the lane rental scheme by ensuring that expenditure is in accordance with Department for Transport regulations.

The committee is made up of representatives from utility companies and us We meet quarterly to authorise funding requests for individual projects aimed at reducing disruption and other adverse effects caused by street and roadworks.
More information relating to the committee can be found in the Terms of Reference (PDF 208KB)
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Lane rental funding applications, guidance and templates"}
The documents below help applicants through the process of applying for funding.
For any queries in relation to applications for funding please email lanerentalfunding@tfl.gov.uk

This document provides a summary of all lane rental funded projects approved by the Lane Rental Governance Committee:

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Lane rental funded approved applications","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/lrgc-approved-applications-mar-2020.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.17MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"LRGC industry publications"}
All projects funded by the Lane Rental Governance Committee are required to provide an industry publication at the close of the project.
This is to advise stakeholders of the outcomes of the project, lessons learnt and recommendations. Below are the publications from all the projects completed to date:
